name: Contao Translations
tagline: Easily export/import all text informations for translators
body: language2file can export every language with all pages (incl. articles and content elements), news, events and forms and reimport all text informations after translation. Three different file types are available for the export (all available separately): CSV, XML and XLIFF. The export files are standard compliant and are supported by most of the translation programs.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
